pydantic/logfire

observability for Python apps with tracing, logs, metrics, and SQL queries

View on index

Related repos

  • Python logging library with simple setup and usage
  • Rust-powered Python logging library with async, rotation, and rich filtering
  • decorator for logging Python function execution and variable changes
  • SQLModel for Python apps, combines SQLAlchemy and Pydantic for working with databases
  • Security vulnerability scanner for Python projects, written in Rust
  • Python tool for crafting, sniffing, and analyzing network packets
  • Traces Python code execution in real-time
  • open source platform for logs, metrics, and traces
  • cloud-native observability database for metrics, logs, traces
  • static type checking for Python projects
